description: Create a high-conversion, SEO-optimized landing page for selling health plans from OSPADEP Salud, Swiss Medical, Omint, and Medifé in Argentina. The page must embed a Pipedrive web form using the provided embed code, be responsive, fast (load under 3 seconds), and follow best practices for design, SEO, and performance.

files.name: index.html
files.description: Main HTML file containing the landing page structure with embedded Pipedrive form.

files.name: styles.css
files.description: Custom CSS file for additional styling on top of Tailwind CSS, including styling for the Pipedrive form.

files.name: script.js
files.description: JavaScript file for any additional interactivity, such as form submission feedback or analytics tracking.

files.name: assets/
files.description: Folder containing logo images for OSPADEP Salud, Swiss Medical, Omint, and Medifé (e.g., logo-ospadep.png, logo-swiss-medical.png, logo-omint.png, logo-medife.png).

color_scheme.description: Use a professional, health-related color palette to convey trust.

components.content: Elige el Mejor Plan de Salud con OSPADEP, Swiss Medical, Omint y Medifé
Cobertura médica premium, personalizada para vos y tu familia en Argentina

styling.description: Style the Pipedrive form to match the landing page's color scheme and ensure it is centered and responsive.

cta_context.text: Complete el formulario para cotizar su plan

components.privacy_notice: Tus datos están seguros con nosotros. Consulta nuestra política de privacidad.

components.content: Por qué elegir nuestros planes de salud

items: Cobertura amplia con los mejores prestadores: OSPADEP, Swiss Medical, Omint y Medifé
Atención personalizada para vos y tu familia
Acceso a una red de clínicas y profesionales de primer nivel

seo_requirements.title: Planes de Salud Premium con OSPADEP, Swiss Medical, Omint y Medifé | Cotiza Ahora
seo_requirements.meta_description: Descubre los mejores planes de salud con OSPADEP, Swiss Medical, Omint y Medifé. Cobertura premium, atención personalizada. ¡Solicita tu cotización hoy!

headings.h1: Elige el Mejor Plan de Salud con OSPADEP, Swiss Medical, Omint y Medifé
h2: Por qué elegir nuestros planes de salud

keywords: planes de salud en Buenos Aires

properties.name: Planes de Salud
properties.provider: OSPADEP Salud, Swiss Medical, Omint, Medifé

styling.description: Ensure the Pipedrive form blends seamlessly with the landing page's design (match colors, fonts, and responsiveness). Add custom CSS in styles.css to adjust form width, button colors, and input field styles to align with the blue-600, white, and green-200 color scheme.

success_feedback.script: Add JavaScript in script.js to detect form submission and display a success message: '¡Formulario enviado! Pronto te contactaremos.'

form_validation.description: Rely on Pipedrive's built-in form validation.

variants.name: with_video
variants.description: Include a 1-minute video placeholder in the hero section

variants.name: cta_variation
variants.description: Add a secondary CTA text above the form: 'Solicita tu Cotización Gratis'

output.instructions: Generate all necessary code, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Embed the provided Pipedrive form code in the hero section. Style the form to match the landing page's design using Tailwind CSS and custom CSS in styles.css. Ensure the page is modular, maintainable, and optimized for performance and SEO. Include comments in the code to explain key sections. Simulate logo images in the assets folder. Test the form embedding locally to ensure it loads correctly and is responsive.
